actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Flood Control Act of 1948 to provide for the dredging of the Kawkawlin River, Michigan.

summary.text: Modifies the Kawkawlin River flood control project, Michigan, to make the operation and maintenance of such project the responsibility of the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Flood Control Act of 1948 to provide for the dredging of the Kawkawlin River, Michigan.
